contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionarypar|vocalization}} '''Vocalization''' or '''vocalisation''' (see [[American and British English spelling differences|spelling differences]]) may refer to: *[[Speech production]], including [[animal communication]] produced by vocal cords *A [[sound change]] whereby a consonant becomes a vowel, particularly common with **[[L-vocalization]] *[[Vocal music]] *The use of marks to denote vowels, including: :*[[Harakat]], in the Arabic alphabet :*[[Niqqud]], in the Hebrew alphabet :**[[Tiberian vocalization]] :*[[Babylonian vocalization]] {{disambig}}
